author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kesko Q4 EBIT Ex-Items At EUR ‍81​ Million
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - KESKO OYJ:
* KESKO‘S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS RELEASE FOR THE PERIOD 1 JAN. 2017 TO 31 DEC. 2017: KESKO‘S NET SALES GREW AND PROFITABILITY IMPROVED
* Q4 EBIT EX-ITEMS EUR ‍81.​ MILLION (REUTERS POLL: EUR 79.3 MILLION)
* Q4 NET SALES EUR ‍2.62​ BILLION (REUTERS POLL: EUR 2.63 BILLION)
* PROPOSES A DIVIDEND OF EUR ‍2.20​ PER SHARE FOR FY 2017 (REUTERS POLL: EUR 2.16)
* ‍NET SALES FOR NEXT 12 MONTHS ARE EXPECTED TO FALL BELOW LEVEL OF PREVIOUS 12 MONTHS​
* ‍COMPARABLE OPERATING PROFIT FOR NEXT 12-MONTH PERIOD IS EXPECTED TO EXCEED LEVEL OF PRECEDING 12 MONTHS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
